overview: Rob is a Principal at Balderton Capital, where his principal role is to find & evaluate potential new investments. He is also involved with portfolio companies Touchlocal & Wooga. Prior to joining Balderton Capital Rob worked for Google in London, as a Manager in their global sales strategy team. Robâ€™s experience at Google included developing growth strategies for a number of Googleâ€™s new businesses (reviewing potential acquisition targets as well as organic growth options), and the integration of DoubleClick in Europe. Before Google Rob spent five years at Bain & Company, the strategy consultancy. Rob holds an MBA from INSEAD and an MMath from Cambridge.
